signupForm.termsDescription:
1. Acceptance of Terms
  • TEKUTOKO (referred to as "we" or "us") requires users to agree to our terms when creating an account and to acknowledge that we may update or modify these terms over time.

 

  1. User Responsibilities
  • Users are responsible for the photos and content they upload, ensuring that it does not infringe on the rights of others (e.g., copyright, privacy).
  • Users must avoid uploading harmful, offensive, or illegal content.
  • Users are responsible for maintaining the security of their accounts and should not share login credentials with others.

 

  1. Prohibited Activities
  • We prohibit users from:
    • Sharing explicit, violent, or otherwise inappropriate images.
    • Violating the privacy of others by uploading photos without their consent.
    • Engaging in harassment, abuse, or any illegal activities through our platform.
    • Using our platform to distribute malicious software, spam, or engage in other harmful activities.

 

  1. Privacy and Data Usage
  • We may collect users’ personal data, such as name, email address, geolocation, metadata from photos, and user behavior, to improve our services.
  • Third-Party Sharing: We may share personal data with third parties for promotional purposes or under specific conditions.
  • We provide a clear explanation of how user data is collected, used, and potentially shared with third parties, including advertisers and analytics companies.
  • We may disclose personal information if required by law or in response to a valid request from public authorities (e.g., law enforcement or government agencies).

 

  1. Content Removal and Account Termination
  • We reserve the right to remove or restrict access to any content that violates our terms without prior notice.
  • If users repeatedly violate our guidelines or engage in inappropriate conduct, we may suspend or terminate their accounts without prior notice.
  • We reserve the right to terminate all services without prior notice.
  • Users may request the deletion of their content and account, and we will comply by removing their data and uploaded content.

 

  1. Limitation of Liability
  • We limit our liability for any harm or loss that may result from the use of our services, including, but not limited to, the exposure of private photos, service disruptions, or data breaches.

 

  1. Content Retention and Deletion
  • Users may request the deletion of their data; however, we may retain certain information (e.g., for legal or business purposes) even after deletion.
  • We retain the right to decide how long account data may remain in our system or backups after a deletion request.
  • Users expressly permit us to delete content they upload as necessary to maintain the functionality of our system.

 

  1. Jurisdiction and Governing Law
  • We specify the legal jurisdiction under which any disputes will be resolved, and the governing law that applies to the use of our platform.

hero.title: The Interactive, Easy, and Fun Platform for
hero.description: Join now and don't miss out on amazing experiences!

introduction.quote: Tekutoko is the ultimate platform to boost customer engagement and foster lasting loyalty. By enabling interactive, memorable experiences, it helps businesses develop stronger strategies, expand their reach, and drive sales growth.

features.title: What Can You Do with Tekutoko?
features.description: With Tekutoko, you can host and join exciting interactive games that make every experience more engaging and fun.

photoHunt.title: Photo Scavenger Hunt
photoHunt.description: Snap & upload photos to complete challenges.

stampCollection.title: Stamp Collection Game
stampCollection.description: Collect stamps and reach the goal.

riddleChallenge.title: Riddle Challenge
riddleChallenge.description: Solve quizzes and riddles to progress.

missionLog.title: Mission Log
missionLog.description: Complete fun challenges and upload your results.

workflowSubmission.title: Workflow Submission
workflowSubmission.description: Submit reports and track work tasks easily.

detailedFeatures.title: Outstanding Features
detailedFeatures.description: Discover the features that make Tekutoko unique and useful for both event organizers and participants.

eventOrganization.title: Easy Event Organization & Participation
eventOrganization.description: Create events with engaging tasks, manage participants, and track progress effortlessly.

exclusiveRewards.title: Exclusive Rewards & Benefits
exclusiveRewards.description: Participate in events to receive gifts, discount codes, and many other attractive offers.

eventTracking.title: Easy Event Tracking & Sharing
eventTracking.description: Easily search, follow, and share your favorite events with friends and community.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Tekutoko?
cta.description: Join thousands of users creating amazing interactive experiences

createEvent.question: How do I create an event?
createEvent.answer: After logging in, you can click the 'Create Event' button to start the process of creating and customizing your event.

getRewards.question: How to participate and get rewards?
getRewards.answer: Participate in activities and events on the website to receive attractive rewards. You can receive rewards via QR code in the 'Rewards' section.

forgotPassword.question: What if I forgot my password?
forgotPassword.answer: On the login page, click 'Forgot password', we will send an email to you to reset your password.

chatbot.title: TekuBot
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm TekuBot, your TEKUTOKO assistant. How can I help you today?
